title: LEGO Harry Potter Book Nook: Hogwarts Express Set with a Train Toy, 2 Minifgures incl. Ron Weasley, plus Hedwig and Scabbers Figures - Wizarding World Gift for 10+ Year Old Boys, Girls & Fans - 76450
features: Magical Harry Potter toy for 10+ year old boys and girls – Create a spellbinding bookshelf setup with the first-ever LEGO Harry Potter book nook, featuring a buildable Hogwarts Express locomotive and carriage
4 Harry Potter characters – Includes LEGO Harry Potter and Ron Weasley minifigures, plus Hedwig the owl and Scabbers figures, all of which can be placed inside the Hogwarts Express train
Collectible LEGO Harry Potter sets – Build a section of the Hogwarts Express train toy and the iconic Platform 9¾ at King’s Cross station, with Harry, Ron and their pets ready to board
Customisable train set – Open the model for easy platform play with side cutouts for train access, close it to fit neatly between books, or split it into two parts to create bookends
Wizarding World gift for Harry Potter fans – This LEGO building toy makes a great gift for 10+ year old boys, girls, and any wizards, witches or Muggles
Intuitive instructions – The LEGO Builder app guides young builders on an intuitive adventure with tools that let zoom in and rotate models in 3D, track progress and save building sets
Explore the range – This set is part of a collection of LEGO Harry Potter toys and figures that let fans play out iconic scenes, create their own stories or simply display the models
description: From the manufacturer Magical gift for Harry Potter fans Organise books with the first-ever LEGO Harry Potter book nook, featuring a buildable section of the Hogwarts Express. Enchanting LEGO Harry Potter house decor Create a customisable book display and play out iconic scenes at King’s Cross Platform 9¾ with Harry Potter characters. LEGO Harry Potter Book Nook: Hogwarts Express Detailed train toy A locomotive and passenger coach with space for minifigures. Use as bookends Divide the model in two to create a stylish book display. 4 Harry Potter characters Harry Potter and Ron Weasley, plus Hedwig and Scabbers. Enter a digital world of building Builders can zoom in, rotate sets in 3D and track progress using the fun, intuitive LEGO Builder app. The LEGO Harry Potter collection Look out for other LEGO Harry Potter toys (sold separately) to inspire boys, girls and any wizards, witches or Muggles.
